name: Scarred Legion
text: Your ritual scars make you more fearsome, and allies with similar scars grow bolder when they’re near you.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks. You also gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saving throws while adjacent to an ally with this feat. When you charge, if you started the charge adjacent to an ally with this feat, you retain the bonus on Will saves until the start of your next turn.
text_zh: 你自傲于身体上仪式性的留疤，而其他拥有类似装饰的战士在与你并肩作战时士气高涨。。
benefit_zh: 你在威吓检定上获得+2加值。在邻接一个拥有本专长的盟友时，你还会在意志豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。当你发动冲锋时，如果你发起冲锋的方格邻接一个拥有本专长的盟友，你会在下一轮开始前一直保有本专长所提供的豁免检定加值。
